divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband and I were outside smoking a cigarette when I first noticed a shooting star. Then I moved around the car to look at the Big Dipper, when a white light appeared from the West,(Facing Beach Street) then seemed to float light a balloon, then it bounced up and around and my husband kept saying that it was a bird or something. It went left then right then sped off towards the left(east), towards Belknap Street and then vanished. While we stood there in amazement, I searched the sky to see if there was another one there. To my astonishment, I turned to look at the big dipper again and noticed a small bright star and then it began to move. I watched it move from the West to the North, it was about an arms lenghth of space. If I had to guess how far away the first one was, I would say below 10,000 feet, the second one was higher than 30,000 ft because I also saw an airplane below the "star" I saw. The second object was visible for about 35 seconds. My husband said that he doesn't even believe what he just saw and I was a bit excited about it.-Fort
Summary: Two Sightings in one night..White Light dancing then vanished Fort Worth
trends: There have been 128 other sightings in Fort Worth
There were 2 other sightings in Fort Worth on or around June 8th 2008
